#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MOD 1000000
using namespace std;
long long  power(long long x,long long  y)
{
	if(y==0)
	  return 1;
	long long  temp=power(x,y/2);
	if(y&1)
	  return ((x*temp)%MOD*temp)%MOD;
	else
	  return  (temp%MOD*temp)%MOD;
}
int main()
{
	long long a,b;
	cin>>a>>b;
	while(a!=0&&b!=0)
	{
		long long res=power(a,b);
		cout<<res<<endl;
		cin>>a>>b;
	}
}
